column5: With the PH & Ammonia being off a little on a couple of Aquarium's I was on duty for the March break, making Trips to 2 School's in Walkerton, Mildmay, Teeswater & 1 in Wingham over these dates March 7, 8, 10, 11, 14, 16, after siphoning 2 pails of water out of each Hatchery & replacing it with Mildmay Well water they sure look good. Some of the Salmon are getting big.Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/03/march-break-school-salmon-hatchery-run.html
